title: Volition

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, you may frame a player. If they are hanged the next day, you gain 1 Permanence.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you control The Psychopath, in addition to your night action you may spend 3 Permanence to become Indominable. You are revealed to the town the next day, gain basic defense, and cannot be hanged. You stop being Indominable once you are the last Psychopathic member left.
Kill Note Addition:
*"This was a necessary sacrifice. I regret nothing."*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.

desc:
Post 4943
*Feel cold emotions in your chest. Turn them into meaning. Endure to your furthest psychological limit. Resist temptation.*
